argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2cpm.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2cpm.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 3 |  | m2cpm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | m2cpm.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Poly1 ` R ) = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N Mat ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( N Mat ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( N Mat ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( N Mat ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_mat2pmatf1 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B -1-1-> ( Base ` ( N Mat ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_m2cpmf | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B --> S ) |
| 10 |  | #P_frn | |- ( T : B --> S -> ran T C_ S ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ran T C_ S ) |
| 12 |  | #P_f1ssr | |- ( ( T : B -1-1-> ( Base ` ( N Mat ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) /\ ran T C_ S ) -> T : B -1-1-> S ) |
| 13 | 8, 11, 12 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B -1-1-> S ) |
